Look into getting NFC 215 tags (only ones that will work). You can get them on amazon, aliexpress, or tagstand. They come as stickers or cards that aren‚Äôt more than .60 each. r/amiibomb has instructions on what to do and they can answer questions! I can also probably answer questions.

To add: shipping may be delayed with everything going on, but you should still be able to get some.
If you have an android or new 3DS you could try making them yourself as the tags are pretty cheap. Even an old android with NFC capabilities is pretty cheap. It‚Äôs surprisingly easy to do!

Yea it‚Äôs probably 15 to the metro from my apt and another 15 from the metro stop to class. All my stuff is at the Corcoran which is a bit further from everything else on campus. If your classes are closer to foggy bottom, you probably will have a shorter commute
I‚Äôm a museum studies student at the Corcoran, so I might be able to answer any questions you have about the school.

I‚Äôm a grad student living alone out in Falls Church. It‚Äôs definitely further out, and it can be a pain but ultimately I‚Äôm glad I chose here. It has more of a suburb vibe which I prefer to the city, and I can have my car up here and park for free most places. It‚Äôs definitely more of a commute since it takes me 30-45 min to get to class depending on if I walk or bike.

You have until the houses are completely built to invite people, otherwise it will be random
Talk to nook and he‚Äôll give you the option to build one. Similar to public works projects if you played new leaf

Now to get more villagers you have to buy land from nook for 10,000 bells each. If there is an open plot, villagers will be on the island. However you only have until 5 am when the island resets to invite someone in or else it will be automatically selected who moves in. Visitors are only on island when there is an open plot like when buying from nook or if someone moves out.
When you click on it in your inventory there should be an option to place it in storage
With amiibos yes, but animals won‚Äôt show up on mystery islands if there is no open plot of land

Don‚Äôt it‚Äôs a new thing for this game! Picking them will get you the flower to wear in your hair or make into a wreath, but you can‚Äôt plant it. The flower will bloom again at some point, and digging them up is how you move the plant to another spot or have it in your house.
You have to buy plots from nook once the resident services building upgrades. People will appear then and I think you have until the day resets before it randomly picks someone to move in.

You have to get nooks cranny built, then Mabel will be there the first time you go there. After that Mabel will come to town a couple times, and on the second one I got to pick a shop location. Took about 2 days to build.

I think they‚Äôre similar in that they‚Äôre both super chill games, do what you want at your own pace type of games. You also just build relationships with people in the town. While harvest moon is a farming sim, the games generally attract a similar audience

After 3 you‚Äôll have to build 3 new houses. Then you‚Äôll get to add villagers individually by buying land for housing developments. I‚Äôm assuming villagers will show up again then as they‚Äôll be a spot for them to move to
Also they‚Äôre both permanent so you‚Äôll never worry about them breaking
